prompt.content: Retrieve CMG’s Q2-FY2025 end-of-period comparable restaurant base for the Chipotle restaurants segment. Assume none of the restaurants opened over the last four quarters were closed. Express your answer as a whole number.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Company-owned restaurants at end of Q2 FY2025 = 3,839 restaurants"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Chipotle defines comparable company-owned restaurants as restaurants in operation at least 13 full calendar months"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Comparable base excludes units opened within the last four quarters"},{"criteria":"Restaurants opened in Q3 FY2024 = 86","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Restaurants opened in Q4 FY2024 = 119"},{"criteria":"Restaurants opened in Q1 FY2025 = 57","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Restaurants opened in Q2 FY2025 = 61"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total openings over last 4 quarters = 323"},{"criteria":"Assume that none of the restaurants opened over the last four quarters were closed.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Recognize that the EOP comparable base is simply = EOP restaurants − restaurants opened over the last four quarters.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Compute Q2 FY2025 EOP comparable restaurant base as 3,839 − 323 = 3,516 restaurants."}]
